My question is, has the NAEB taken any action or contemplating
any representation before Congress relating to the possible implica¬
tions for educational institutions which have university presses
and a radio or television station?
What might we do here to present our concern and to indicate
the implications for us. Dean Moore has recommended that we sub¬
mit a statement. Do you have any immediate recommendations for
our guidance?
Cordially
Garnet R. Garrison
crat
P.S. I am sending a copy of this letter to Ralph Steet le to see
what the JCET has done or is planning to do in this matter.
